metrics_conclusion: It's My Life has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: It's My Life has sections analyzed in the following keys: E Mixolydian, D♭ Major,  and B♭ Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
